abstract: Some models of the Microsoft Zune, a portable media device, were hit by a glitch that caused them to freeze. Microsoft says it is working on the problem.
snippet: Some models of the Microsoft Zune, a portable media device, were hit by a glitch that caused them to freeze. Microsoft says it is working on the problem.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE 5:23 P.M.: This post has been updated to include information from Microsoft regarding the cause of the glitch.

headline.main: The Day the Microsoft Zunes Stood Still
